{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents discuss the assessment of thiamine deficiency. Thiamine is involved in glucose metabolism, and one document mentions that red blood cell transketolase activity was found to be below normal values in patients with suspected thiamine deficiency. Another document uses activated enzyme assays (erythrocyte transketolase) to assess tissue stores of the dependent vitamin cofactors, including thiamine.", "answer_choice": A}
